pl.marcinmazur.portfolio.service

Interface StatisticService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StatisticServiceImpl

    public interface StatisticService
    Interface for managing statistics of access codes and project visiting.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the general statistics for given project name
      List<Object[]> getMonthlyDataForSelectedProject(String projectName, String startDate, String endDate, int monthLength)
      Returns the monthly statistical data (data - number of project visiting) as a list of Object[] for given project name and date range.

      • getMonthlyDataForSelectedProject

        List<Object[]> getMonthlyDataForSelectedProject(String projectName,
                                                String startDate,
                                                String endDate,
                                                int monthLength)
        Returns the monthly statistical data (data - number of project visiting) as a list of Object[] for given project name and date range.
        Parameters:
        projectName - The String containing the name of the project
        startDate - The String containing the first day of the range
        endDate - The String containing the last day of the range
        monthLength - The int containing the length of the month
        Returns:
        A List<Object[]> representing the list of results

        endDate - The String containing the last day of the range
        monthLength - The int containing the length of the month
